title: Internal compiler error while using async_graphql subscriptions

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust pub fn graphql( socket_address: SocketAddr, ) -> impl Filter + Clone { let schema = Schema::build(Query, EmptyMutation, Subscription).finish(); println!("{}", &schema.sdl()); graphiql(socket_address) .or(graphql_endpoint(schema.clone())) .or(graphql_subscription(schema)) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.0 (2c8cc3432 2023-03-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74 commit-date: 2023-03-06 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.68.0 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` query stack during panic: #0 [layout_of] computing layout of `[async block@src/graphql.rs:25:1: 25:16]` #1 [mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked] elaborating drops for `graphql::::create_field_stream::{closure#0}` #2 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `graphql::::create_field_stream::{closure#0}` #3 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'forcing query with already existing `DepNode` - query-key: ParamEnvAnd { param_env: ParamEnv { caller_bounds: [], reveal: All, constness: NotConst }, value: [async block@src/graphql.rs:25:1: 25:16] } - dep-node: layout_of(d4cd3d0b5b89fd14-7ca53844cb53c39e)', /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/dep_graph/graph.rs:316:9 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: >::with_task::, core::result::Result, rustc_middle::ty::layout::LayoutError>> 3: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 4: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 5: ::layout_of 6: ::check 7: ::run_lint 8: rustc_mir_transform::pass_manager::run_passes_inner 9: rustc_mir_transform::run_analysis_to_runtime_passes 10: rustc_mir_transform::mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked 11: ::with_deps::<>::with_task_impl, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal>::{closure#0}, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal> 12: >::with_task::, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal> 13:
